tweets.text: @oneunderscore__ Come ride it!
Mini adventure bike? lol https://t.co/G3YTU3aXcu
Why is Chuck Todd still at NBC and Kasie Hunt is leaving? https://t.co/uq4jKsR4qH

@opiumhum As we all know decentralization does not solve problems of inequality- if bad actors want to, they can fill a decentralized space or technology and shape it to their desires. This is something I would be actively worried about if I were advocating about the future of crypto.

@opiumhum From afar, it seems like smart people go “this is using a lot of power” and you guys go “YOU DONT SEE THE VISION!!” and then someone says “a lot of right wingers seem to be coalescing around this” and you say “YOU ARE SLAMMING INDEPENDENT ARTISTS” which strikes me as weird.

@opiumhum This thread does not really address his criticism, and attacking anyone with concerns as “having an agenda” is a bad faith argument. I think it is totally fair to worry about the bro-ification of crypto, how it could easily amplify existing structures of inequality.
@EVARA161 @BuffaloWas Not going to blur the minor?
@oneunderscore__ can't believe you got a second twitter account before a mastodon account smh
RT @mrejfox: Honestly it is just like the hackers I know to be smart enough to hack the @AP twitter account but not be smart enough to do i…
RT @mrejfox: I wonder if we would be doing better had we not imprisoned some of the smartest hackers of our generation in the early 2000s
RT @mrejfox: Starting my new internet-hacker-themed podcast morning show, Fawkes and Friends
You ever feel really down like you didn’t get anything done today and never get anything done and then you look back at your to do list for the day and it’s 5/8ths done https://t.co/CR0l4K7U56
RT @AshAgony: I'm really tired of seeing people claiming that ICE agents are somewhere & not even including pics or video. Stop doing that…
RT @RepMGS: The explanation for this photo stopped me in my tracks. OIG observed hundreds of detainees in lines, surrendering their valuabl…
RT @maassive: I'd love to see a data reporter use CBP procurement records to track and predict immigrant detention and enforcement actions.…

I'm excited to try and use data and technology to solve important problems and I'm excited about putting out a lot more stuff in the year ahead. 

I'm also on the lookout for more work. NY/Remote - contract preferred, contract-to-fulltime with the right fit.

 ejfox@ejfox.com

@bpopken @oneunderscore__ @BrandyZadrozny Beyond that- a huge thank you to everyone at NBC. Some of the nicest, kindest people dealing with the most stressful things you can imagine. I'll be at 30 Rock all week, let's get coffee!
A huge thanks to @bpopken @oneunderscore__ and @BrandyZadrozny for their kindness, patience and willingness to collaborate and teach me things and let me bother them for coffee walks.

There's a lot of cool stuff coming for the Big Board that hasn't been released yet and I'm excited for the things that will come as we all embark on one of the most important election cycles we've seen.

Along with some incredibly smart people including @bradoyler @sxywu @jeremiak @msnbcmichael @2nfo and others we completely re-made the Big Board using Chrome, D3, GeoJSON, SVG, and web technologies under incredible deadlines.

I got to work with the election night GOAT: @SteveKornacki whose depth of knowledge and enthusiasm never ceased to astonish (regardless of cameras)– I now know more about elections than I ever imagined was possible. https://t.co/2jTRnE1NXn

I'm really proud of collaborations with @thatianrose and more for some NBC News specials, including @jonschuppe's incredible piece Post Bail, where we included an interactive version of a risk assessment algorithm https://t.co/kIAOu0wKxN https://t.co/ViLJvHIVoF
This is my last week at NBC. I am so grateful for the opportunities I got to do work I'm really proud of with incredibly smart and caring people.
RT @ScottHech: A Black man was murdered. They strangled the life from his body. On camera. We all saw it. Just feet away. Clear as day. He…
https://t.co/nOq4d0I6Wi
Can’t wait til you old people die and we can finally get started trying to fix the mess you’ve left us with
@hyphy_republic Do it
it's kinda cool to live in a time in history where there is no precedent, no model for how this will go, weeeeeeeeeee

@jglovier thanks man! Super appreciate that!
Planning a nice little US road trip https://t.co/pG35Z0qPRg
Waiting for the Silicon Valley bubble to pop again and then I’ll move back to Oakland
@eagereyes Why not? I think HN is a good model because of the amount of frank discussion and technique-sharing that goes on there.
Random Fiverr jobs pay for my Netflix

Shared: PING PONG DOOR BY TOBIAS FRANZEL: 
Tobias Fränzel is brilliant, not only is this pretty creative .. http://bit.ly/qPAFZ
And now I'm going to sleep.
Screenwriter of new Harry Potter should be punched so so so so so hard. What the fuck? Seriously. What the fuck. A perfectly good book.
Man the sidekick is so friggin rad!
Setting up my sidekick! =D
Just woke up- going to camp very soonlike.
Doing pen-and-paper Fusend mockups and then passing out. Hopefully I'll have an update from a sidekick soon.
Talking to Marco about Fusend- putting it on our server. Getting ready for an alpha launch.
Just tried to order a sidekick online with mom- apparently we need to buy it in store. Tomorrow.
